title: 10 Ways To Get a Free DoorDash Gift Card
description: Want to save money on food? Free DoorDash gift cards can help you save money on food delivery. They let you order tasty meals without spending your own cash, and getting these free gift cards doesn’t have to cost you anything either. I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using sites like the... The post 10 Ways To Get a Free DoorDash Gift Card appeared first on Making Sense Of Cents.
author: Michelle Schroeder-Gardner
excerpt: Here are the best ways to get a free DoorDash gift card. I have personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using these sites!
text: Want to save money on food? Free DoorDash gift cards can help you save money on food delivery. They let you order tasty meals without spending your own cash, and getting these free gift cards doesn’t have to cost you anything either. I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using sites like the… Want to save money on food? Free DoorDash gift cards can help you save money on food delivery. They let you order tasty meals without spending your own cash, and getting these free gift cards doesn’t have to cost you anything either. I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using sites like the ones listed below, and you can too. These platforms make it easy to earn free DoorDash gift cards by completing tasks like taking surveys or scanning receipts. With just a bit of effort, you can enjoy your favorite meals delivered right to your door without spending a dime. Quick note: If you’re a new user, you can sign up for DoorDash here and get $10 off each of your first 3 DoorDash orders over $15. Best Ways To Get Free DoorDash Gift Cards Here’s a quick list before we begin: Freecash Fetch Rewards PayPal Honey  Swagbucks Branded Surveys  DoorDash referral program Ibotta MyPoints InboxDollars PrizeRebel Below are the best ways to get a free DoorDash gift card. Proof that I’ve made money playing games on Freecash. The $0.05 amounts were rewards for playing 2 minutes each day. The larger amounts like $40, $70, and $150 were for reaching certain levels. I turned my points in all for free Amazon gift cards, but you can easily redeem them for DoorDash gift cards too. 1. Freecash Freecash is a website where you can make extra money in your spare time. You can earn by doing things like playing games, trying new apps, and taking surveys. When you join Freecash, you’ll see lots of offers to choose from. Each task you finish gives you coins, which can be turned into real money or gift cards. Freecash has free DoorDash gift cards in amounts ranging from $15 to $100, and there is no fee to withdraw your points. Many people use Freecash every day to make some extra cash. You might earn $1 for a quick survey or up to $650 for trying out a new game. The amount you can make depends on the task. I have personally made $302 just by playing a game on Freecash on my phone, and it only took one week. I turned it into free gift cards and I got the gift card redemption codes instantly. Click here to sign up for Freecash. Recommended reading: Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit? 2. Fetch Rewards Fetch Rewards is a free app that gives you gift cards for scanning your grocery receipts from any grocery store. I use this app on all of my grocery receipts (even today!), and I like how easy it is to use. You can get points from any receipt. This includes grocery stores, gas stations, restaurants, and more. Just take a picture of your receipt with your phone. The app gives you at least 25 points for each receipt you scan. You can earn more points by buying specific items shown in the app (like a loaf of bread, shampoo, or fruit). You can turn your points into gift cards for places like DoorDash, Amazon, Target, and Starbucks. There are over 200 gift card options to choose from. Fetch Rewards is safe and doesn’t cost anything to use. Millions of people use it every month to save money on things they already buy. While you won’t get rich using Fetch Rewards, it’s a simple way to earn some extra gift cards. Just shop like you normally do and take a picture of your receipt when you’re done. You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here. Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review 3. PayPal Honey PayPal Honey is a free tool that can help you save money when you shop online. It’s a browser extension you can add to your computer in just a few clicks. Once it’s set up, it works by itself to find discount codes for you. When you’re ready to buy something, PayPal Honey searches for coupon codes. If it finds any coupons that work, it applies them to your cart. You don’t have to do anything extra – it’s all automatic! PayPal Honey works with lots of online stores. You can use it when you’re buying clothes, ordering food, or even booking a trip. You can also earn points when you shop with PayPal Honey. These points add up, and you can trade them for free DoorDash gift cards. You can learn more about Honey by clicking here. I’ve received over 100 gift cards from Swagbucks, as you can see in this screenshot. 4. Swagbucks Swagbucks is a fun way to earn free DoorDash gift cards. You can join for free and start earning points right away (these points are called SB). There are many ways to get SB. You can take surveys, watch videos, or play games. You can also shop online and earn cash back. Even searching the web can earn you points! I have personally earned over 110 free gift cards on Swagbucks over the years, so I know this is real! Once you have enough points, you can trade them for a gift card. DoorDash is one of the many gift card options. You can also get PayPal cash if you prefer. Sign up for Swagbucks here (and earn $5 in free bonus points). Recommended reading: Swagbucks Review – How Much Can You Earn On Swagbucks? 5. Branded Surveys Branded Surveys is a fun way to earn some extra cash. You can sign up for free and start taking surveys right away. It’s open to people in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom who are at least 16 years old. Each survey can pay between 50 cents and $5, depending on how long it takes. Most surveys take about 5-20 minutes to finish. You can earn points in other ways too. Answer the daily poll for 5 points, or invite friends to join. There’s even a contest where top survey takers can win bonus points. Once you have 500 points, you can cash out (that’s equal to $5). You can redeem your points for DoorDash gift cards varying from $5 to $200. Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus. Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn 6. DoorDash referrals DoorDash has a referral program where you can get DoorDash credits to put toward your DoorDash order. When you share your referral link with friends, you both win. Right now, you can give $30 to a friend and get $20 back (you’ll want to check your account to see what the current referral promotions are, as this can change). Here’s how it works: Your friend signs up using your referral link. They place their first order of $15 or more. You get $20 in DoorDash credits, and they get some credit as well. Here are the official terms: “Get $20 in credits when someone signs up using your referral link and places their first order over $15. Your friend also gets $30 off ($10 off each of their first 3 orders).” You can find your referral code/link in the DoorDash app or on their website after you log in. Here’s my referral link so that you can sign up and see (and you can also get free DoorDash credit!). 7. Ibotta Ibotta is an app that can help you get free DoorDash gift cards. It’s easy to use and gives you cash back on grocery purchases. It’s a lot like Fetch Rewards, and I personally like to use both of these grocery receipt scanning apps on the same receipts (it gives you more chances to earn points!). Here’s how Ibotta works: Before you shop, check the Ibotta app for offers (it will tell you the number of points you will get for a specific item, like a loaf of bread or a container of yogurt). Add the ones you want to your list in the app and then go shopping like normal. After you’re done, take a picture of your receipt with the app. Ibotta will match your purchases to the offers you picked and you’ll get cash back for the items that match. You can then turn the points you’ve earned into free DoorDash gift cards. You can sign up for Ibotta by clicking here. 8. MyPoints MyPoints is a rewards site that lets you earn points for different online activities. You can get these points by taking surveys, watching videos, playing games (such as Angry Birds, Wheel of Fortune, Bejeweled, and Scrabble), and shopping online. You can even earn points for trying out new products or for signing up for trial offers to companies such as Hulu, Disney+, ESPN, AT&T, HelloFresh, and more. The points you collect can be traded for gift cards, including ones for DoorDash. This means you can get free food delivered to your door. MyPoints is available to people located in the United States. You can sign up for MyPoints by clicking here. 9. InboxDollars InboxDollars is a good way to earn free DoorDash gift cards, as you can make money by doing easy tasks online. These tasks include taking surveys, watching videos, reading emails, and playing games (games include Monopoly where you can earn up to $446.25, for example). You can also earn cash by shopping online and printing coupons. As you complete tasks, you earn real money and you can choose to get paid via PayPal or gift cards. Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus. 10. PrizeRebel PrizeRebel is a fun way to get free DoorDash gift cards. It’s a website where you can do easy tasks to earn points, such as taking surveys, watching videos, and trying new apps. You can sign up for PrizeRebel for free. Once you’re a member, you’ll see a list of activities you can do to earn points and you can just pick the ones that look most interesting to you. When you have enough points, you can trade them for a DoorDash gift card. You can choose between $15 DoorDash gift cards or even getting an annual DashPass gift card. PrizeRebel has different gift card values, so you can choose how much you want. PrizeRebel is easy to use on your computer or phone. You can earn points whenever you have a few spare minutes. It’s an easy way to get free food delivery without spending your own money. Sign up for PrizeRebel by clicking here. Frequently Asked Questions Below are answers to common questions about how to get a free DoorDash gift card. Is there a way to get free food on DoorDash? Yes, there are ways to get free food on DoorDash. The top ways I recommend are to invite friends and family to DoorDash and to earn free DoorDash gift cards by using apps where you can earn points by playing games or answering surveys. Can I really get DoorDash gift card codes without spending money? Yes, you can earn DoorDash gift card codes without spending money, such as by signing up for apps and earning points. You can earn points by shopping online, scanning your grocery receipts, playing games on your phone, and more. There are scams out there, so I always recommend that you do your research to make sure it’s not a scam you are responding to. How do you get a free DoorDash gift card? You can earn free DoorDash gift cards in a few ways: Use reward apps like Fetch Rewards or Swagbucks Take surveys on sites like Branded Surveys Sign up for cash back services like PayPal Honey Refer friends to DoorDash These methods let you earn points or cash that you can trade for gift cards. Most of these ways give you online gift cards with codes to redeem, but sometimes you may be able to get a physical gift card. Do DoorDash gift card generators work for free gift cards? No, there isn’t something that generates free DoorDash gift card codes. Anything claiming to be a DoorDash gift card generator is likely a scam from untrusted sources that are trying to get your personal information (like your social security number) or credit card numbers. They typically just list a bunch of invalid codes that are a waste of your time. If you want a DoorDash promo code, I recommend trying an app like Freecash or Swagbucks and earning points that can be turned into a real free DoorDash gift card. How To Get a Free DoorDash Gift Card – Summary I hope you enjoyed my article on how to get a free DoorDash gift card. If you’re looking to save money on food delivery services, free DoorDash gift cards can be a great way to cut costs. I love using the DoorDash platform, but I know how quickly the food costs can add up. Finding DoorDash savings can help you to save money in your budget! There are several simple ways to earn these gift cards without spending your own money. You can take online surveys, play games, or use cash back apps like Freecash, Swagbucks, and Fetch Rewards. These platforms reward you for completing tasks like shopping or scanning receipts, making it easy to rack up points that you can trade for DoorDash gift cards. Earning free DoorDash gift cards is not only possible, but it’s something I’ve done myself. By using rewards sites like Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards, I’ve collected over $1,000 in free gift cards. If you want to save money on food delivery, these simple methods can help you get free DoorDash gift cards quickly and easily! What is your favorite way to get free DoorDash gift cards? Want to save money on food? Free DoorDash gift cards can help you save money on food delivery. They let you order tasty meals without spending your own cash, and getting these free gift cards doesn’t have to cost you anything either. I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using sites like the…

Want to save money on food?

Free DoorDash gift cards can help you save money on food delivery. They let you order tasty meals without spending your own cash, and getting these free gift cards doesn’t have to cost you anything either.

I’ve personally earned over $1,000 in free gift cards using sites like the ones listed below, and you can too. These platforms make it easy to earn free DoorDash gift cards by completing tasks like taking surveys or scanning receipts. With just a bit of effort, you can enjoy your favorite meals delivered right to your door without spending a dime.

Quick note: If you’re a new user, you can sign up for DoorDash here and get $10 off each of your first 3 DoorDash orders over $15.

Best Ways To Get Free DoorDash Gift Cards

Here’s a quick list before we begin:

  • Freecash
  • Fetch Rewards
  • PayPal Honey 
  • Swagbucks
  • Branded Surveys 
  • DoorDash referral program
  • Ibotta
  • MyPoints
  • InboxDollars
  • PrizeRebel

Below are the best ways to get a free DoorDash gift card.

1. Freecash

Freecash is a website where you can make extra money in your spare time. You can earn by doing things like playing games, trying new apps, and taking surveys.

When you join Freecash, you’ll see lots of offers to choose from. Each task you finish gives you coins, which can be turned into real money or gift cards. Freecash has free DoorDash gift cards in amounts ranging from $15 to $100, and there is no fee to withdraw your points.

Many people use Freecash every day to make some extra cash. You might earn $1 for a quick survey or up to $650 for trying out a new game. The amount you can make depends on the task.

I have personally made $302 just by playing a game on Freecash on my phone, and it only took one week. I turned it into free gift cards and I got the gift card redemption codes instantly.

Click here to sign up for Freecash.

Recommended reading: Freecash Review – Is Freecash Legit?

2. Fetch Rewards

Fetch Rewards is a free app that gives you gift cards for scanning your grocery receipts from any grocery store. I use this app on all of my grocery receipts (even today!), and I like how easy it is to use.

You can get points from any receipt. This includes grocery stores, gas stations, restaurants, and more. Just take a picture of your receipt with your phone.

The app gives you at least 25 points for each receipt you scan. You can earn more points by buying specific items shown in the app (like a loaf of bread, shampoo, or fruit).

You can turn your points into gift cards for places like DoorDash, Amazon, Target, and Starbucks. There are over 200 gift card options to choose from.

Fetch Rewards is safe and doesn’t cost anything to use. Millions of people use it every month to save money on things they already buy.

While you won’t get rich using Fetch Rewards, it’s a simple way to earn some extra gift cards. Just shop like you normally do and take a picture of your receipt when you’re done.

You can sign up for Fetch Rewards by clicking here.

Recommended reading: Fetch Rewards Review

3. PayPal Honey

PayPal Honey is a free tool that can help you save money when you shop online. It’s a browser extension you can add to your computer in just a few clicks. Once it’s set up, it works by itself to find discount codes for you.

When you’re ready to buy something, PayPal Honey searches for coupon codes. If it finds any coupons that work, it applies them to your cart. You don’t have to do anything extra – it’s all automatic!

PayPal Honey works with lots of online stores. You can use it when you’re buying clothes, ordering food, or even booking a trip.

You can also earn points when you shop with PayPal Honey. These points add up, and you can trade them for free DoorDash gift cards.

You can learn more about Honey by clicking here.

4. Swagbucks

Swagbucks is a fun way to earn free DoorDash gift cards. You can join for free and start earning points right away (these points are called SB).

There are many ways to get SB. You can take surveys, watch videos, or play games. You can also shop online and earn cash back. Even searching the web can earn you points!

I have personally earned over 110 free gift cards on Swagbucks over the years, so I know this is real!

Once you have enough points, you can trade them for a gift card. DoorDash is one of the many gift card options. You can also get PayPal cash if you prefer.

Sign up for Swagbucks here (and earn $5 in free bonus points).

Recommended reading: Swagbucks Review – How Much Can You Earn On Swagbucks?

5. Branded Surveys

Branded Surveys is a fun way to earn some extra cash. You can sign up for free and start taking surveys right away. It’s open to people in the United States, Canada, and the United Kingdom who are at least 16 years old.

Each survey can pay between 50 cents and $5, depending on how long it takes. Most surveys take about 5-20 minutes to finish.

You can earn points in other ways too. Answer the daily poll for 5 points, or invite friends to join. There’s even a contest where top survey takers can win bonus points.

Once you have 500 points, you can cash out (that’s equal to $5). You can redeem your points for DoorDash gift cards varying from $5 to $200.

Sign up for Branded Surveys here and receive a free 100-point sign-up bonus.

Recommended reading: Branded Surveys Review: How Much You Can Earn

6. DoorDash referrals

DoorDash has a referral program where you can get DoorDash credits to put toward your DoorDash order. When you share your referral link with friends, you both win.

Right now, you can give $30 to a friend and get $20 back (you’ll want to check your account to see what the current referral promotions are, as this can change).

Here’s how it works: Your friend signs up using your referral link. They place their first order of $15 or more. You get $20 in DoorDash credits, and they get some credit as well.

Here are the official terms: “Get $20 in credits when someone signs up using your referral link and places their first order over $15. Your friend also gets $30 off ($10 off each of their first 3 orders).”

You can find your referral code/link in the DoorDash app or on their website after you log in.

Here’s my referral link so that you can sign up and see (and you can also get free DoorDash credit!).

7. Ibotta

Ibotta is an app that can help you get free DoorDash gift cards. It’s easy to use and gives you cash back on grocery purchases.

It’s a lot like Fetch Rewards, and I personally like to use both of these grocery receipt scanning apps on the same receipts (it gives you more chances to earn points!).

Here’s how Ibotta works: Before you shop, check the Ibotta app for offers (it will tell you the number of points you will get for a specific item, like a loaf of bread or a container of yogurt). Add the ones you want to your list in the app and then go shopping like normal.

After you’re done, take a picture of your receipt with the app. Ibotta will match your purchases to the offers you picked and you’ll get cash back for the items that match.

You can then turn the points you’ve earned into free DoorDash gift cards.

You can sign up for Ibotta by clicking here.

8. MyPoints

MyPoints is a rewards site that lets you earn points for different online activities.

You can get these points by taking surveys, watching videos, playing games (such as Angry Birds, Wheel of Fortune, Bejeweled, and Scrabble), and shopping online.

You can even earn points for trying out new products or for signing up for trial offers to companies such as Hulu, Disney+, ESPN, AT&T, HelloFresh, and more.

The points you collect can be traded for gift cards, including ones for DoorDash. This means you can get free food delivered to your door.

MyPoints is available to people located in the United States.

You can sign up for MyPoints by clicking here.

9. InboxDollars

InboxDollars is a good way to earn free DoorDash gift cards, as you can make money by doing easy tasks online.

These tasks include taking surveys, watching videos, reading emails, and playing games (games include Monopoly where you can earn up to $446.25, for example). You can also earn cash by shopping online and printing coupons.

As you complete tasks, you earn real money and you can choose to get paid via PayPal or gift cards.

Sign up for InboxDollars here and get a free $5 bonus.

10. PrizeRebel

PrizeRebel is a fun way to get free DoorDash gift cards. It’s a website where you can do easy tasks to earn points, such as taking surveys, watching videos, and trying new apps.

You can sign up for PrizeRebel for free. Once you’re a member, you’ll see a list of activities you can do to earn points and you can just pick the ones that look most interesting to you.

When you have enough points, you can trade them for a DoorDash gift card. You can choose between $15 DoorDash gift cards or even getting an annual DashPass gift card. PrizeRebel has different gift card values, so you can choose how much you want.

PrizeRebel is easy to use on your computer or phone. You can earn points whenever you have a few spare minutes. It’s an easy way to get free food delivery without spending your own money.

Sign up for PrizeRebel by clicking here.

Frequently Asked Questions

Below are answers to common questions about how to get a free DoorDash gift card.

Is there a way to get free food on DoorDash?

Yes, there are ways to get free food on DoorDash. The top ways I recommend are to invite friends and family to DoorDash and to earn free DoorDash gift cards by using apps where you can earn points by playing games or answering surveys.

Can I really get DoorDash gift card codes without spending money?

Yes, you can earn DoorDash gift card codes without spending money, such as by signing up for apps and earning points. You can earn points by shopping online, scanning your grocery receipts, playing games on your phone, and more. There are scams out there, so I always recommend that you do your research to make sure it’s not a scam you are responding to.

How do you get a free DoorDash gift card?

You can earn free DoorDash gift cards in a few ways:

  1. Use reward apps like Fetch Rewards or Swagbucks
  2. Take surveys on sites like Branded Surveys
  3. Sign up for cash back services like PayPal Honey
  4. Refer friends to DoorDash

These methods let you earn points or cash that you can trade for gift cards. Most of these ways give you online gift cards with codes to redeem, but sometimes you may be able to get a physical gift card.

Do DoorDash gift card generators work for free gift cards?

No, there isn’t something that generates free DoorDash gift card codes. Anything claiming to be a DoorDash gift card generator is likely a scam from untrusted sources that are trying to get your personal information (like your social security number) or credit card numbers. They typically just list a bunch of invalid codes that are a waste of your time. If you want a DoorDash promo code, I recommend trying an app like Freecash or Swagbucks and earning points that can be turned into a real free DoorDash gift card.

How To Get a Free DoorDash Gift Card – Summary

I hope you enjoyed my article on how to get a free DoorDash gift card.

If you’re looking to save money on food delivery services, free DoorDash gift cards can be a great way to cut costs. I love using the DoorDash platform, but I know how quickly the food costs can add up. Finding DoorDash savings can help you to save money in your budget!

There are several simple ways to earn these gift cards without spending your own money. You can take online surveys, play games, or use cash back apps like Freecash, Swagbucks, and Fetch Rewards. These platforms reward you for completing tasks like shopping or scanning receipts, making it easy to rack up points that you can trade for DoorDash gift cards.

Earning free DoorDash gift cards is not only possible, but it’s something I’ve done myself. By using rewards sites like Swagbucks and Fetch Rewards, I’ve collected over $1,000 in free gift cards. If you want to save money on food delivery, these simple methods can help you get free DoorDash gift cards quickly and easily!

What is your favorite way to get free DoorDash gift cards?
